120 static inline MmwDemo_genWindow(uint32_t *win, uint32_t winIndx, float phi, uint32_t winType)
121 {
122  if(winType == MMW_WIN_BLACKMAN)
123  {
124  //Blackman window
125  float a0 = 0.42;
126  float a1 = 0.5;
127  float a2 = 0.08;
128  *win = (uint32_t) ((ONE_Q17 * (a0 - a1*cos(phi * winIndx) +
129  a2*cos(2 * phi * winIndx))) + 0.5); //in Q17
130  if(*win >= ONE_Q17)
131  {
132  *win = ONE_Q17 - 1;
133  }
134  }
135  else if(winType == MMW_WIN_HANNING)
136  {
137  //Hanning window
138  *win = (uint32_t) ((ONE_Q17 * 0.5* (1 - cos(phi * winIndx))) + 0.5); //in Q17
139  if(*win >= ONE_Q17)
140  {
141  *win = ONE_Q17 - 1;
142  }
143  }
144  else if(winType == MMW_WIN_RECT)
145  {
146  //Rectangular window
147  *win = (uint32_t) (ONE_Q17/16); //in Q17
148  }
149 }
150 
161 void MmwDemo_EDMA_transferCompletionCallbackFxn(uintptr_t arg,
162  uint8_t transferCompletionCode)
163 {
164  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj = (MmwDemo_DataPathObj *)arg;
165 
166  switch (transferCompletionCode)
167  {
168  case MMWDEMO_EDMA_TRANSFER_COMPLETION_CODE_1D_DONE:
169  Semaphore_post(obj->EDMA_1Ddone_semHandle);
170  break;
171 
172  case MMWDEMO_EDMA_TRANSFER_COMPLETION_CODE_2D_DONE:
173  Semaphore_post(obj->EDMA_2Ddone_semHandle);
174  break;
175 
176  case MMWDEMO_EDMA_TRANSFER_COMPLETION_CODE_CFAR_DONE:
177  Semaphore_post(obj->EDMA_CFARdone_semHandle);
178  break;
179 
180  default:
181  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
182  break;
183  }
184 }
185 
193 void MmwDemo_dataPathHwaDoneIsrCallback(void * arg)
194 {
195  Semaphore_Handle semHandle;
196 
197  if (arg != NULL) {
198  semHandle = (Semaphore_Handle)arg;
199  Semaphore_post(semHandle);
200  }
201 }

211 int32_t MmwDemo_config2D_EDMA(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
212 {
213  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
214  EDMA_Handle handle = obj->edmaHandle;
215  HWA_SrcDMAConfig dmaConfig;
216  uint32_t sizeOfAbsTransfer = obj->numDopplerBins * obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer;
217  uint32_t sizeOfAbsTransferBytes = sizeOfAbsTransfer * sizeof(uint16_t);
218 
219  uint32_t sizeOfComplexTransfer = obj->numDopplerBins * obj->numVirtualAntennas * obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer;
220  uint32_t sizeOfComplexTransferBytes = sizeOfComplexTransfer * sizeof(uint32_t);
221 
222  /**************PROGRAM DMA'S FOR PING**************************************/
223 
224  if(obj->datapathChainSel == DATA_PATH_CHAIN_SEPARATE_LOGMAG)
225  {
226  /*************************************************************************
227  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer 2D FFT data from accelerator output
228  buffer (ping) to L3
229  *************************************************************************/
230  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
231  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CH_ID, //chId,
232  true, //isEventTriggered
233  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID1, //linkChId,
234  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID1, //chainChId,
235  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2D_OUT_PING,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pSrcAddress,
236  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->radarCube,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
237  sizeOfComplexTransferBytes, // numBytes,
238  obj->numRangeBins /(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer), //numBlocks,
239  0, //srcIncrBytes,
240  sizeOfComplexTransferBytes * 2, //dstIncrBytes,
241  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
242  true, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
243  false, //isTransferCompletionEnabled
244  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
245  NULL);
246 
247  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
248  {
249  goto exit;
250  }
251 
252  /***************************************************************************
253  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer 2D abs data from accelerator output
254  * buffer (ping) to L3
255  **************************************************************************/
256  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
257  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID1, //chId,
258  false, //isEventTriggered
259  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID2, //linkChId,
260  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID2, //chainChId,
261  (uint32_t*)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2D_OUT_PING,
262  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)+ sizeOfComplexTransferBytes), //*pSrcAddress,
263  (uint32_t*) SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
264  sizeOfAbsTransferBytes, // numBytes,
265  obj->numRangeBins/(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer), //numBlocks,
266  0, //srcIncrBytes,
267  sizeOfAbsTransferBytes * 2, //dstIncrBytes,
268  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
269  false, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
270  false, //isTransferCompletionEnabled
271  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
272  NULL);
273 
274  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
275  {
276  goto exit;
277  }
278  }
279  else
280  {
281  /***************************************************************************
282  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer 2D abs data from accelerator output
283  * buffer (ping) to L3
284  **************************************************************************/
285  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
286  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CH_ID, //chId,
287  true, //isEventTriggered
288  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID1, //linkChId,
289  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID2, //chainChId,
290  (uint32_t*)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2D_OUT_PING,
291  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)+ sizeOfComplexTransferBytes), //*pSrcAddress,
292  (uint32_t*) SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
293  sizeOfAbsTransferBytes, // numBytes,
294  obj->numRangeBins/(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer), //numBlocks,
295  0, //srcIncrBytes,
296  sizeOfAbsTransferBytes * 2, //dstIncrBytes,
297  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
298  false, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
299  false, //isTransferCompletionEnabled
300  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
301  NULL);
302 
303  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
304  {
305  goto exit;
306  }
307  }
308 
309  /******************************************************************************************
310  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer data from L3 to accelerator input buffer (ping)
311  ******************************************************************************************/
312  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
313  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID2, //chId,
314  false, //isEventTriggered
315  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID3, //linkChId,
316  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID3, //chainChId,
317  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->radarCube,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pSrcAddress,
318  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2D_INP_PING,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
319  sizeOfComplexTransferBytes, // numBytes,
320  obj->numRangeBins/(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer), //numBlocks,
321  sizeOfComplexTransferBytes * 2, //srcIncrBytes,
322  0, //dstIncrBytes,
323  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
324  true, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
325  false, //isTransferCompletionEnabled;
326  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
327  NULL);
328 
329  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
330  {
331  goto exit;
332  }
333 
334  HWA_getDMAconfig(obj->hwaHandle, MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_2D_PING, &dmaConfig);
335 
336  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaOneHotSignature(handle,
337  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID3, //chId,
338  false, //isEventTriggered
339  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)dmaConfig.srcAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pSrcAddress
340  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)dmaConfig.destAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pDestAddress
341  dmaConfig.aCnt,
342  dmaConfig.bCnt,
343  dmaConfig.cCnt,
344  MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID4); //linkChId
345 
346  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
347  {
348  goto exit;
349  }
350 
351  /**************PROGRAM DMA'S FOR PONG********************************************************/
352 
353  if(obj->datapathChainSel == DATA_PATH_CHAIN_SEPARATE_LOGMAG)
354  {
355  /******************************************************************************************
356  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer 2D FFT data from accelerator output buffer (pong) to L3
357  ******************************************************************************************/
358 
359  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
360  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CH_ID, //chId,
361  true, //isEventTriggered
362  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID1, //linkChId,
363  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID1, //chainChId,
364  (uint32_t*)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2D_OUT_PONG,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)), //*pSrcAddress,
365  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)(obj->radarCube + sizeOfComplexTransfer),SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL),
366  sizeOfComplexTransferBytes, // numBytes,
367  obj->numRangeBins/(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer), //numBlocks,
368  0, //srcIncrBytes,
369  sizeOfComplexTransferBytes * 2, //dstIncrBytes,
370  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
371  true, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
372  false, //isTransferCompletionEnabled;
373  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
374  NULL);
375 
376  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
377  {
378  goto exit;
379  }
380 
381  /******************************************************************************************
382  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer 2D abs data from accelerator output buffer (pong) to L3
383  ******************************************************************************************/
384  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
385  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID1, //chId,
386  false, //isEventTriggered
387  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID2, //linkChId,
388  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID2, //chainChId,
389  (uint32_t*)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2D_OUT_PONG,
390  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)+ sizeOfComplexTransferBytes),//*pSrcAddress,
391  (uint32_t*)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)(obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix + sizeOfAbsTransfer),
392  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)), //*pDestAddress,
393  sizeOfAbsTransferBytes, //numBytes,
394  obj->numRangeBins/(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer), //numBlocks,
395  0, //srcIncrBytes,
396  sizeOfAbsTransferBytes * 2, //dstIncrBytes,
397  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
398  false, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
399  true, //isTransferCompletionEnabled;
400  MmwDemo_EDMA_transferCompletionCallbackFxn, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
401  (uintptr_t)obj);
402 
403  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
404  {
405  goto exit;
406  }
407  }
408  else
409  {
410  /******************************************************************************************
411  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer 2D abs data from accelerator output buffer (pong) to L3
412  ******************************************************************************************/
413  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
414  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CH_ID, //chId,
415  true, //isEventTriggered
416  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID1, //linkChId,
417  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID2, //chainChId,
418  (uint32_t*)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2D_OUT_PONG,
419  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)+ sizeOfComplexTransferBytes),//*pSrcAddress,
420  (uint32_t*)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)(obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix + sizeOfAbsTransfer),
421  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)), //*pDestAddress,
422  sizeOfAbsTransferBytes, //numBytes,
423  obj->numRangeBins/(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer), //numBlocks,
424  0, //srcIncrBytes,
425  sizeOfAbsTransferBytes * 2, //dstIncrBytes,
426  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
427  false, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
428  true, //isTransferCompletionEnabled;
429  MmwDemo_EDMA_transferCompletionCallbackFxn, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
430  (uintptr_t)obj);
431 
432  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
433  {
434  goto exit;
435  }
436  }
437  /******************************************************************************************
438  * PROGRAM DMA channel to transfer data from L3 to accelerator input buffer (pong)
439  ******************************************************************************************/
440  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
441  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID2, //chId,
442  false, //isEventTriggered
443  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID3, //linkChId,
444  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID3, //chainChId,
445  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)(obj->radarCube + sizeOfComplexTransfer),SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pSrcAddress,
446  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2D_INP_PONG,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
447  sizeOfComplexTransferBytes, //numBytes,
448  obj->numRangeBins/(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer), //numBlocks,
449  sizeOfComplexTransferBytes * 2, //srcIncrBytes,
450  0, //dstIncrBytes,
451  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
452  true, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
453  false, //isTransferCompletionEnabled;
454  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
455  NULL);
456 
457  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
458  {
459  goto exit;
460  }
461 
462  HWA_getDMAconfig(obj->hwaHandle, MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_2D_PONG, &dmaConfig);
463 
464  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaOneHotSignature(handle,
465  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID3, //chId,
466  false, //isEventTriggered
467  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pSrcAddress
468  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pDestAddress
469  dmaConfig.aCnt,
470  dmaConfig.bCnt,
471  dmaConfig.cCnt,
472  MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID4); //linkChId
473 
474  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
475  {
476  goto exit;
477  }
478 
479 exit:
480  return(errorCode);
481 }

491 void MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCommon(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
492 {
493  int32_t errCode;
494  uint32_t fftWindow;
495  uint32_t winLen, winIndx, hwaRamOffset;
496  float phi;
497  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
498 
499  MmwDemo_config1D_EDMA(obj);
500  MmwDemo_config2D_EDMA(obj);
501  MmwDemo_configCFAR_EDMA(obj);
502 
503  /**********************************************/
504  /* Disable HWA and reset to known state */
505  /**********************************************/
506 
507  /* Disable the HWA */
508  errCode = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle,0);
509  if (errCode != 0)
510  {
511  //System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCommon:HWA_enable(0) returned %d\n",errCode);
512  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
513  return;
514  }
515 
516  /* Reset the internal state of the HWA */
517  errCode = HWA_reset(obj->hwaHandle);
518  if (errCode != 0)
519  {
520  //System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCommon:HWA_reset returned %d\n",errCode);
521  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
522  return;
523  }
524 
525  /***********************/
526  /* CONFIG WINDOW RAM */
527  /***********************/
528  /* if windowing is enabled, load the window coefficients in RAM */
529  //1D-FFT window
530  hwaRamOffset = 0;
531  winLen = obj->numAdcSamples;
532  phi = 2 * PI_ / ((float) winLen - 1);
533  for(winIndx = 0; winIndx < winLen; winIndx++)
534  {
535  MmwDemo_genWindow(&fftWindow, winIndx, phi, MMW_WIN_BLACKMAN);
536  errCode = HWA_configRam(obj->hwaHandle,
537  HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM,
538  (uint8_t *)&fftWindow,
539  sizeof(uint32_t), //size in bytes
540  hwaRamOffset); //offset in bytes
541  if (errCode != 0)
542  {
543  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configRam returned %d\n",errCode);
544  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
545  return;
546  }
547  hwaRamOffset += sizeof(uint32_t);
548  }
549 
550  winLen = obj->numDopplerBins;
551  phi = 2 * PI_ / ((float) winLen - 1);
552  for(winIndx = 0; winIndx < winLen; winIndx++)
553  {
554  MmwDemo_genWindow(&fftWindow, winIndx, phi, MMW_WIN_HANNING);
555  errCode = HWA_configRam(obj->hwaHandle,
556  HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM,
557  (uint8_t *)&fftWindow,
558  sizeof(uint32_t), //size in bytes
559  hwaRamOffset); //offset in bytes
560  if (errCode != 0)
561  {
562  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configRam returned %d\n",errCode);
563  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
564  return;
565  }
566  hwaRamOffset += sizeof(uint32_t);
567  }
568 
569  /**********************************************/
570  /* ENABLE NUMLOOPS DONE INTERRUPT FROM HWA */
571  /**********************************************/
572  errCode = HWA_enableDoneInterrupt(obj->hwaHandle,
573  MmwDemo_dataPathHwaDoneIsrCallback,
574  obj->HWA_done_semHandle);
575  if (errCode != 0)
576  {
577  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enableDoneInterrupt returned %d\n",errCode);
578  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
579  return;
580  }
581 
582  /***********************************************/
583  /* ENABLE FFT Twiddle coefficient dithering */
584  /***********************************************/
585  /* Config Common Registers */
586  hwaCommonConfig.configMask = HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_TWIDDITHERENABLE |
587  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_LFSRSEED;
588  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.twidDitherEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_ENABLE;
589  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.lfsrSeed = 0x1234567; /*Some non-zero value*/
590 
591  errCode = HWA_configCommon(obj->hwaHandle,&hwaCommonConfig);
592  if (errCode != 0)
593  {
594  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configCommon returned %d\n",errCode);
595  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
596  return;
597  }
598 
599 }
600 
606 void MmwDemo_hwaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
607 {
608  /* Initialize the HWA */
609  HWA_init();
610 }
611 
617 void MmwDemo_edmaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
618 {
619  uint8_t edmaNumInstances, inst;
620  Semaphore_Params semParams;
621  int32_t errorCode;
622 
623  edmaNumInstances = EDMA_getNumInstances();
624  for (inst = 0; inst < edmaNumInstances; inst++)
625  {
626  errorCode = EDMA_init(inst);
627  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
628  {
629  //System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d initialization returned error %d\n", errorCode);
630  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
631  return;
632  }
633  //System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d has been initialized\n", inst);
634  }
635 
636  memset(&obj->EDMA_errorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_errorInfo));
637  memset(&obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo));
638 
639  Semaphore_Params_init(&semParams);
640  semParams.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
641  obj->EDMA_1Ddone_semHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
642 
643  /* Enable Done Interrupt */
644  Semaphore_Params_init(&semParams);
645  semParams.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
646  obj->HWA_done_semHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
647 
648  Semaphore_Params_init(&semParams);
649  semParams.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
650  obj->EDMA_2Ddone_semHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
651 
652  Semaphore_Params_init(&semParams);
653  semParams.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
654  obj->EDMA_CFARdone_semHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
655 }
656 
664 void MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle, EDMA_errorInfo_t *errorInfo)
665 {
666  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
667 }
668 
676 void MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle,
677  EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo_t *errorInfo)
678 {
679  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
680 }

687 void MmwDemo_hwaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj, SOC_Handle socHandle)
688 {
689  int32_t errCode;
690 
691  /* Open the HWA Instance */
692  obj->hwaHandle = HWA_open(0, socHandle, &errCode);
693  if (obj->hwaHandle == NULL)
694  {
695  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the HWA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
696  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
697  return;
698  }
699  //System_printf("Debug: HWA Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", obj->hwaHandle);
700 }
701 
707 void MmwDemo_hwaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
708 {
709  int32_t errCode;
710 
711  /* Close the HWA Instance */
712  errCode = HWA_close(obj->hwaHandle);
713  if (errCode != 0)
714  {
715  //System_printf("Error: Unable to close the HWA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
716  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
717  return;
718  }
719  //System_printf("Debug: HWA Instance %p has been closed successfully\n", obj->hwaHandle);
720 }

727 void MmwDemo_edmaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
728 {
729  int32_t errCode;
730  EDMA_instanceInfo_t edmaInstanceInfo;
731  EDMA_errorConfig_t errorConfig;
732 
733  obj->edmaHandle = EDMA_open(0, &errCode, &edmaInstanceInfo);
734 
735  if (obj->edmaHandle == NULL)
736  {
737  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the EDMA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
738  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
739  return;
740  }
741  //System_printf("Debug: EDMA Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", obj->edmaHandle);
742 
743  errorConfig.isConfigAllEventQueues = true;
744  errorConfig.isConfigAllTransferControllers = true;
745  errorConfig.isEventQueueThresholdingEnabled = true;
746  errorConfig.eventQueueThreshold = EDMA_EVENT_QUEUE_THRESHOLD_MAX;
747  errorConfig.isEnableAllTransferControllerErrors = true;
748  errorConfig.callbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn;
749  errorConfig.transferControllerCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn;
750  if ((errCode = EDMA_configErrorMonitoring(obj->edmaHandle, &errorConfig)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
751  {
752  //System_printf("Error: EDMA_configErrorMonitoring() failed with errorCode = %d\n", errCode);
753  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
754  return;
755  }
756 
757 }
758 
764 void MmwDemo_edmaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
765 {
766  EDMA_close(obj->edmaHandle);
767 }
768 
777 void MmwDemo_config2D_HWA(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
778 {
779  int32_t errCode;
780  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
781 
782  /* Disable the HWA */
783  errCode = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle,0);
784  if (errCode != 0)
785  {
786  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enable(1) returned %d\n",errCode);
787  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
788  return;
789  }
790 
791  /***************************************/
792  /* Doppler FFT chain */
793  /***************************************/
794  HWAutil_configDopplerFFT(obj->hwaHandle,
795  HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D, // paramSetStartIdx,
796  obj->numDopplerBins, // dopplerFftSize,
797  obj->numVirtualAntennas, // numVirtualAnt,
798  obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer, // numRangeBinsPerIter,
799  obj->numAdcSamples + MMW_HWA_WINDOWRAM_1D_OFFSET, // windowOffsetBytes
800 
801  MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_2D_PING,
802  MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_2D_PONG,
803  MMW_HWA_DMA_DEST_CHANNEL_2D_PING,
804  MMW_HWA_DMA_DEST_CHANNEL_2D_PONG,
805 
806  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_2D_INP_PING), //hwaMemSourcePingOffset
807  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_2D_INP_PONG), //hwaMemSourcePongOffset
808  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_2D_OUT_PING), //hwaMemDestPingOffset
809  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_2D_OUT_PONG),
810  obj->datapathChainSel); //hwaMemDestPongOffset
811 
812 
813  /***********************/
814  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
815  /***********************/
816  /* Config Common Registers */
817  hwaCommonConfig.configMask =
818  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
819  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
820  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
821  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
822  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD;
823 
824 
825  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = obj->numRangeBins/(2*obj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer);
826  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D; //TODO //only one paramset used here so start and stop index are the same
827  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D + HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_2D-1;//TODO
828  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
829  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
830  errCode = HWA_configCommon(obj->hwaHandle,&hwaCommonConfig);
831  if (errCode != 0)
832  {
833  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configCommon returned %d\n",errCode);
834  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
835  return;
836  }
837 }
838 
847 void MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger2D(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
848 {
849  int32_t errCode;
850 
851  /* Enable the HWA */
852  errCode = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle,1); // set 1 to enable
853  if (errCode != 0)
854  {
855  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enable(1) returned %d\n",errCode);
856  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
857  return;
858  }
859 
860  EDMA_startTransfer(obj->edmaHandle, MMW_EDMA_2D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID2, EDMA3_CHANNEL_TYPE_DMA);
861  EDMA_startTransfer(obj->edmaHandle, MMW_EDMA_2D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID2, EDMA3_CHANNEL_TYPE_DMA);
862 }
863 
874 void MmwDemo_dataPathWait2D(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
875 {
876  Bool status;
877 
878  /* wait for the all paramSets done interrupt */
879  status = Semaphore_pend(obj->HWA_done_semHandle, BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
880  if (status != TRUE)
881  {
882  //System_printf("Error: Semaphore_pend returned %d\n",status);
883  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
884  return;
885  }
886 
887  status = Semaphore_pend(obj->EDMA_2Ddone_semHandle, BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
888  if (status != TRUE)
889  {
890  //System_printf("Error: Semaphore_pend returned %d\n",status);
891  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
892  return;
893  }
894 }

897 #define SOC_MAX_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS 3

908 void MmwDemo_dataPathObjInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj,
909  MmwDemo_CliCfg_t *cliCfg,
910  MmwDemo_CliCommonCfg_t *cliCommonCfg)
911 {
912  memset(obj, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_DataPathObj));
913  obj->cliCfg = cliCfg;
914  obj->cliCommonCfg = cliCommonCfg;
915 
916  /* Default datapath chain selection */
917  obj->datapathChainSel = DATA_PATH_CHAIN_COMBINED_LOGMAG;
918 
919 }

926 void MmwDemo_dataPathCfgBuffers(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj, MmwDemoMemPool_t *pool)
927 {
928  MmwDemo_memPoolReset(pool);
929 
930  obj->radarCube = (uint32_t *) MmwDemo_memPoolAlloc(pool, obj->numRangeBins *
931  obj->numDopplerBins * obj->numVirtualAntennas * sizeof(uint32_t));
932 
933  if (obj->radarCube == NULL)
934  {
935  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
936  }
937 
938  obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix = (uint16_t *) MmwDemo_memPoolAlloc(pool, obj->numRangeBins *
939  obj->numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t));
940 
941  if (obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix == NULL)
942  {
943  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
944  }
945 
946  obj->cfarDetectionOut = (cfarDetOutput_t *) MmwDemo_memPoolAlloc(pool,
947  MMW_MAX_OBJ_OUT * sizeof(cfarDetOutput_t));
948 
949  if (obj->cfarDetectionOut == NULL)
950  {
951  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
952  }
953 
954  if (obj->cliCfg->guiMonSel.rangeAzimuthHeatMap)
955  {
956  obj->azimuthStaticHeatMap = (cmplx16ImRe_t *) MmwDemo_memPoolAlloc(pool,
957  obj->numRangeBins * obj->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t));
958 
959  if (obj->azimuthStaticHeatMap == NULL)
960  {
961  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
962  }
963  }
964 
965  if (obj->dcRangeSigMean == NULL)
966  {
967  obj->dcRangeSigMean = (cmplx32ImRe_t *) Memory_alloc (NULL,
968  DC_RANGE_SIGNATURE_COMP_MAX_BIN_SIZE * SOC_MAX_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS * SOC_MAX_NUM_RX_ANTENNAS * sizeof(cmplx32ImRe_t),
969  (uint8_t) MMWDEMO_MEMORY_ALLOC_DOUBLE_WORD_ALIGN,
970  NULL);
971  }
972 }
973 
984 void MmwDemo_memPoolReset(MmwDemoMemPool_t *pool)
985 {
986  pool->indx = 0;
987 }
988 
1005 uint8_t *MmwDemo_memPoolAlloc(MmwDemoMemPool_t *pool, uint32_t size)
1006 {
1007  uint8_t *ptr = NULL;
1008 
1009  if ((size % 4) != 0)
1010  {
1011  return(ptr);
1012  }
1013 
1014  if ((pool->indx + size) <= pool->size)
1015  {
1016  ptr = pool->base + pool->indx;
1017  pool->indx += size;
1018  }
1019 
1020  return(ptr);
1021 }
1022 
1031 int32_t MmwDemo_config1D_EDMA(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
1032 {
1033  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
1034  EDMA_Handle handle = obj->edmaHandle;
1035  HWA_SrcDMAConfig dmaConfig;
1036 
1037  /* Ping configuration to transfer 1D FFT output from HWA to L3 RAM transposed */
1038  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaTranspose(handle,
1039  MMW_EDMA_1D_PING_CH_ID, //chId,
1040  MMW_EDMA_1D_PING_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID, //linkChId,
1041  MMW_EDMA_1D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID, //chainChId,
1042  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_1D_OUT_PING,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pSrcAddress,
1043  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->radarCube,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
1044  obj->numRxAntennas, //numAnt,
1045  obj->numRangeBins, //numRangeBins,
1046  obj->numChirpsPerFrame, //numChirpsPerFrame,
1047  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
1048  true, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
1049  false, //isTransferCompletionEnabled
1050  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
1051  NULL);
1052 
1053  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1054  {
1055  goto exit;
1056  }
1057 
1058  /* Pong configuration to transfer 1D FFT output from HWA to L3 RAM transposed */
1059  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaTranspose(handle,
1060  MMW_EDMA_1D_PONG_CH_ID, //chId,
1061  MMW_EDMA_1D_PONG_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID, //linkChId,
1062  MMW_EDMA_1D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID, //SR_DBT_xxx //chainChId,
1063  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_1D_OUT_PONG,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pSrcAddress,
1064  (uint32_t*) SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)(obj->radarCube + obj->numRxAntennas),SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
1065  obj->numRxAntennas, //numAnt,
1066  obj->numRangeBins, //numRangeBins,
1067  obj->numChirpsPerFrame, //numChirpsPerFrame,
1068  true, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
1069  true, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
1070  true, //isTransferCompletionEnabled
1071  MmwDemo_EDMA_transferCompletionCallbackFxn, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
1072  (uintptr_t)obj);
1073 
1074  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1075  {
1076  goto exit;
1077  }
1078 
1079  /**************************************************************************
1080  * PROGRAM EDMA2_ACC_CHAN0 (resp. EDMA2_ACC_CHAN1) to communicate completion
1081  of DMA CHAN EDMA_TPCC0_REQ_HWACC_0 (resp. EDMA_TPCC0_REQ_HWACC_1)
1082  *************************************************************************/
1083 
1084  HWA_getDMAconfig(obj->hwaHandle, MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_1D_PING, &dmaConfig);
1085 
1086  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaOneHotSignature(handle,
1087  MMW_EDMA_1D_PING_CHAIN_CH_ID, //chId,
1088  false, //isEventTriggered
1089  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pSrcAddress
1090  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pDestAddress
1091  dmaConfig.aCnt,
1092  dmaConfig.bCnt,
1093  dmaConfig.cCnt,
1094  MMW_EDMA_1D_PING_ONE_HOT_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID); //linkChId
1095 
1096  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1097  {
1098  goto exit;
1099  }
1100 
1101  HWA_getDMAconfig(obj->hwaHandle, MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_1D_PONG, &dmaConfig);
1102 
1103  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaOneHotSignature(handle,
1104  MMW_EDMA_1D_PONG_CHAIN_CH_ID, //chId,
1105  false, //isEventTriggered
1106  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pSrcAddress
1107  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pDestAddress
1108  dmaConfig.aCnt,
1109  dmaConfig.bCnt,
1110  dmaConfig.cCnt,
1111  MMW_EDMA_1D_PONG_ONE_HOT_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID); //linkChId
1112 
1113  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1114  {
1115  goto exit;
1116  }
1117 
1118 exit:
1119  return(errorCode);
1120 }
1121 
1122 
1131 int32_t MmwDemo_configCFAR_EDMA(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
1132 {
1133  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
1134  EDMA_Handle handle = obj->edmaHandle;
1135  HWA_SrcDMAConfig dmaConfig;
1136 
1137 //program DMA to MOVE DATA FROM L3_DETECTION TO ACCEL, THIS SHOULD BE LINKED TO DMA2ACC
1138  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
1139  MMW_EDMA_CFAR_INP_CH_ID, //chId,
1140  false, //isEventTriggered
1141  MMW_EDMA_CFAR_INP_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID1, //linkChId,
1142  MMW_EDMA_CFAR_INP_CHAIN_CH_ID, //chainChId,
1143  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pSrcAddress,
1144  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_CFAR_INP,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
1145  obj->numRangeBins * obj->numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t), //numBytes,
1146  1, //numBlocks,
1147  0, //srcIncrBytes,
1148  0, //dstIncrBytes,
1149  false, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
1150  true, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
1151  false, //isTransferCompletionEnabled;
1152  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
1153  NULL);
1154 
1155  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1156  {
1157  goto exit;
1158  }
1159 
1160  HWA_getDMAconfig(obj->hwaHandle, MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_CFAR, &dmaConfig);
1161 
1162  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaOneHotSignature(handle,
1163  MMW_EDMA_CFAR_INP_CHAIN_CH_ID, //chId,
1164  false, //isEventTriggered
1165  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pSrcAddress
1166  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pDestAddress
1167  dmaConfig.aCnt,
1168  dmaConfig.bCnt,
1169  dmaConfig.cCnt,
1170  MMW_EDMA_CFAR_INP_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID2); //linkChId
1171 
1172  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1173  {
1174  goto exit;
1175  }
1176 
1177 //another DMA to move data from ACC to L3_OBJECT LIN
1178  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(handle,
1179  MMW_EDMA_CFAR_OUT_CH_ID, //chId,
1180  true, //isEventTriggered
1181  MMW_EDMA_CFAR_OUT_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID1, //linkChId,
1182  MMW_EDMA_CFAR_OUT_CHAIN_CH_ID, //chainChId,
1183  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_CFAR_OUT,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pSrcAddress,
1184  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->cfarDetectionOut,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //*pDestAddress,
1185  MMW_MAX_OBJ_OUT * sizeof(cfarDetOutput_t), //numBytes
1186  1, //numBlocks,
1187  0, //srcIncrBytes,
1188  0, //dstIncrBytes,
1189  false, //isIntermediateChainingEnabled,
1190  false, //isFinalChainingEnabled,
1191  true, //isTransferCompletionEnabled;
1192  MmwDemo_EDMA_transferCompletionCallbackFxn,//transferCompletionCallbackFxn)
1193  (uintptr_t)obj);
1194 
1195 exit:
1196  return(errorCode);
1197 }
1198 
1211 int32_t MmwDemo_config2DSingleBin_EDMA
1212 (
1213  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj,
1214  uint32_t srcBuffPtr,
1215  uint32_t dstBuffPtr
1216 )
1217 {
1218  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
1219  volatile bool edmaTransComplete = false ;
1220  HWA_SrcDMAConfig dmaConfig;
1221 
1222  /* Copy one Range bin to HWA memory */
1223  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaContiguous(
1224  obj->edmaHandle,
1225  MMW_EDMA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_CH_ID,
1226  false,
1227  MMW_EDMA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID,
1228  MMW_EDMA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_CHAIN_CH_ID,
1229  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(srcBuffPtr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pSrcAddress
1230  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress(dstBuffPtr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pDestAddress
1231  obj->numVirtualAntennas * sizeof(uint32_t) * obj->numDopplerBins,
1232  1,
1233  0,
1234  0,
1235  true,
1236  true,
1237  false,
1238  NULL,
1239  NULL);
1240 
1241 
1242  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1243  {
1244  goto exit;
1245  }
1246 
1247  /* Copy one hot signature to trigger HWA 2D FFT */
1248  HWA_getDMAconfig(obj->hwaHandle, MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SINGLEBIN_2DFFT, &dmaConfig);
1249 
1250  errorCode = EDMAutil_configHwaOneHotSignature(obj->edmaHandle,
1251  MMW_EDMA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_CHAIN_CH_ID, //chId,
1252  false, //isEventTriggered
1253  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)dmaConfig.srcAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pSrcAddress
1254  (uint32_t*)SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)dmaConfig.destAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL), //pDestAddress
1255  dmaConfig.aCnt,
1256  dmaConfig.bCnt,
1257  dmaConfig.cCnt,
1258  MMW_EDMA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_SHADOW_LINK_CH_ID2); //linkChId
1259 
1260  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1261  {
1262  goto exit;
1263  }
1264 exit:
1265  return(errorCode);
1266 }
1267

1279 void MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger2DSingleBin(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
1280 {
1281  int32_t errCode;
1282 
1283  /* Enable the HWA */
1284  errCode = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle, 1); // set 1 to enable
1285  if (errCode != 0)
1286  {
1287  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1288  return;
1289  }
1290 
1291  /* Trigger EDMA */
1292  EDMA_startDmaTransfer(obj->edmaHandle, MMW_EDMA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_CH_ID);
1293 }
1294 
1302 void MmwDemo_config1D_HWA(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
1303 {
1304  int32_t errCode;
1305  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
1306  uint8_t hwaTriggerMode;
1307 
1308  /* Disable the HWA */
1309  errCode = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle,0); // set 1 to enable
1310  if (errCode != 0)
1311  {
1312  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enable(1) returned %d\n",errCode);
1313  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1314  return;
1315  }
1316  if(obj->dataPathMode == DATA_PATH_STANDALONE)
1317  {
1318  /* trigger manually and immediately */
1319  hwaTriggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_SOFTWARE;
1320  }
1321  else
1322  {
1323  /* trigger done by ADC buffer */
1324  hwaTriggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DFE;
1325  }
1326 
1327  HWAutil_configRangeFFT(obj->hwaHandle,
1328  MMW_HWA_START_POS_PARAMSETS_1D,
1329  obj->numAdcSamples,
1330  obj->numRangeBins,
1331  obj->numRxAntennas,
1332  MMW_HWA_WINDOWRAM_1D_OFFSET,
1333  MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_1D_PING,
1334  MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_1D_PONG,
1335  MMW_HWA_DMA_DEST_CHANNEL_1D_PING,
1336  MMW_HWA_DMA_DEST_CHANNEL_1D_PONG,
1337  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_1D_ADCBUF_INP),
1338  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_1D_OUT_PING),
1339  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_1D_OUT_PONG),
1340  hwaTriggerMode
1341  );
1342 
1343  /***********************/
1344  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
1345  /***********************/
1346  /* Config Common Registers */
1347  hwaCommonConfig.configMask = HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
1348  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
1349  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
1350  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
1351  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD;
1352  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = obj->numChirpsPerFrame/2;
1353  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = MMW_HWA_START_POS_PARAMSETS_1D;
1354  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = MMW_HWA_START_POS_PARAMSETS_1D + HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D - 1;
1355  if(obj->dataPathMode == DATA_PATH_STANDALONE)
1356  {
1357  /* HWA will input data from M0 memory*/
1358  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
1359  }
1360  else
1361  {
1362  /* HWA will input data from ADC buffer memory*/
1363  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_ENABLE;
1364  }
1365  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
1366  errCode = HWA_configCommon(obj->hwaHandle,&hwaCommonConfig);
1367  if (errCode != 0)
1368  {
1369  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configCommon returned %d\n",errCode);
1370  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1371  return;
1372  }
1373 }
1374 
1382 void MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger1D(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
1383 {

1385

1389  {
1390  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enable(1) returned %d\n",errCode);

1392  return;
1393  }

1397  if (errCode != 0)
1398  {
1399  //System_printf("Error: HWA_setDMA2ACCManualTrig(0) returned %d\n",errCode);
1400  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1401  return;
1402  }
1403  errCode = HWA_setDMA2ACCManualTrig(obj->hwaHandle, MMW_HWA_DMA_TRIGGER_SOURCE_1D_PONG);
1404  if (errCode != 0)
1405  {
1406  //System_printf("Error: HWA_setDMA2ACCManualTrig(1) returned %d\n",errCode);
1407  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1408  return;
1409  }

1668 void MmwDemo_configAngleEstimation_HWA(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj, uint32_t numObjOut)
1669 {
1670  int32_t errCode;
1671  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
1672  int32_t numHwaParamSets3D;
1673

1675  errCode = HWA_enable(obj->hwaHandle,0); // set 1 to enable
1676  if (errCode != 0)
1677  {
1678  //System_printf("Error: HWA_enable(1) returned %d\n",errCode);
1679  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1680  return;
1681  }
1682 
1683  if(obj->numVirtualAntElev == 0)
1684  {
1685  HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuth(obj->hwaHandle,
1686  HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D + HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_2D + HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_CFAR,
1687  obj->numVirtualAntennas,
1688  obj->numAngleBins,

1691  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_ABS_OUT)); //hwaMemDestOffset
1692  numHwaParamSets3D = 1;
1693  }
1694  else
1695  {
1696  HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuthElevation(obj->hwaHandle,
1697  HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D + HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_2D + HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_CFAR,
1698  obj->numVirtualAntAzim,
1699  obj->numVirtualAntElev,
1700  obj->numAngleBins,
1701  numObjOut,
1702  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_INP),
1703  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_INP),
1704  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_ABS_OUT),
1705  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_CPLX_OUT),
1706  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_CPLX_OUT));
1707  numHwaParamSets3D = 3;
1708  }
1709 
1710  /***********************/
1711  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
1712  /***********************/
1713  /* Config Common Registers */
1714  hwaCommonConfig.configMask = HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
1715  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
1716  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
1717  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
1718  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD;
1719 
1720 
1721  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = 1;
1722  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D + HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_2D +
1723  HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_CFAR;
1724  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_1D + HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_2D +
1725  HWAUTIL_NUM_PARAM_SETS_CFAR + (numHwaParamSets3D - 1);
1726  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
1727  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
1728 
1729  errCode = HWA_configCommon(obj->hwaHandle,&hwaCommonConfig);
1730  if (errCode != 0)
1731  {
1732  //System_printf("Error: HWA_configCommon returned %d\n",errCode);
1733  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1734  return;
1735  }

1807 
1817 void MmwDemo_dcRangeSignatureCompensation(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
1818 {
1819  uint32_t antIdx, rngBinIdx;
1820  uint32_t ind;
1821  int32_t dcRangeSigMeanSize;
1822  uint32_t doppIdx;
1823  cmplx16ImRe_t *fftOut1D = (cmplx16ImRe_t *) obj->radarCube;
1824  MmwDemo_CalibDcRangeSigCfg *calibDc = &obj->cliCfg->calibDcRangeSigCfg;
1825  int32_t rngOffset = obj->numVirtualAntennas * obj->numDopplerBins;
1826  int32_t numVirtAnt = obj->numVirtualAntennas;
1827  int32_t negativeBinIdx = calibDc->negativeBinIdx;
1828  int32_t positiveBinIdx = calibDc->positiveBinIdx;
1829  cmplx32ImRe_t *dcRangeSigMean = obj->dcRangeSigMean;
1830  int32_t numRangeBins = obj->numRangeBins;
1831  int32_t log2NumAvgChirps = obj->log2NumAvgChirps;
1832  int32_t numDopplerBins = obj->numDopplerBins;
1833 
1834  dcRangeSigMeanSize = numVirtAnt * (positiveBinIdx - negativeBinIdx + 1);
1835  if (obj->dcRangeSigCalibCntr == 0)
1836  {
1837  memset(dcRangeSigMean, 0, dcRangeSigMeanSize * sizeof(cmplx32ImRe_t));
1838  }
1839 
1840  /* Calibration */
1841  if (obj->dcRangeSigCalibCntr < calibDc->numAvgChirps)
1842  {
1843  for (doppIdx = 0; doppIdx < numDopplerBins; doppIdx++)
1844  {
1845  /* Accumulate */
1846  ind = 0;
1847  for (rngBinIdx = 0; rngBinIdx <= positiveBinIdx; rngBinIdx++)
1848  {
1849  for (antIdx = 0; antIdx < numVirtAnt; antIdx++)
1850  {
1851  int32_t binIdx = rngBinIdx * rngOffset + doppIdx * numVirtAnt + antIdx;
1852  dcRangeSigMean[ind].real += fftOut1D[binIdx].real;
1853  dcRangeSigMean[ind].imag += fftOut1D[binIdx].imag;
1854  ind++;
1855  }
1856  }
1857  for (rngBinIdx = 0; rngBinIdx < -negativeBinIdx; rngBinIdx++)
1858  {
1859  for (antIdx = 0; antIdx < numVirtAnt; antIdx++)
1860  {
1861  int32_t binIdx = (numRangeBins + negativeBinIdx + rngBinIdx) * rngOffset +
1862  doppIdx * numVirtAnt + antIdx;
1863  dcRangeSigMean[ind].real += fftOut1D[binIdx].real;
1864  dcRangeSigMean[ind].imag += fftOut1D[binIdx].imag;
1865  ind++;
1866  }
1867  }
1868  obj->dcRangeSigCalibCntr++;
1869  }
1870 
1871  if (obj->dcRangeSigCalibCntr == calibDc->numAvgChirps)
1872  {
1873  /* Divide */
1874  for (ind = 0; ind < dcRangeSigMeanSize; ind++)
1875  {
1876  dcRangeSigMean[ind].real = dcRangeSigMean[ind].real >> log2NumAvgChirps;
1877  dcRangeSigMean[ind].imag = dcRangeSigMean[ind].imag >> log2NumAvgChirps;
1878  }
1879  }
1880  }
1881  else
1882  {
1883  /* fftOut1D -= dcRangeSigMean */
1884  for (doppIdx = 0; doppIdx < numDopplerBins; doppIdx++)
1885  {
1886  ind = 0;
1887  for (rngBinIdx = 0; rngBinIdx <= positiveBinIdx; rngBinIdx++)
1888  {
1889  for (antIdx = 0; antIdx < numVirtAnt; antIdx++)
1890  {
1891  int32_t binIdx = rngBinIdx * rngOffset + doppIdx * numVirtAnt + antIdx;
1892  fftOut1D[binIdx].real -= dcRangeSigMean[ind].real;
1893  fftOut1D[binIdx].imag -= dcRangeSigMean[ind].imag;
1894  ind++;
1895  }
1896  }
1897  for (rngBinIdx = 0; rngBinIdx < -negativeBinIdx; rngBinIdx++)
1898  {
1899  for (antIdx = 0; antIdx < numVirtAnt; antIdx++)
1900  {
1901  int32_t binIdx = (numRangeBins + negativeBinIdx + rngBinIdx) * rngOffset +
1902  doppIdx * numVirtAnt + antIdx;
1903  fftOut1D[binIdx].real -= dcRangeSigMean[ind].real;
1904  fftOut1D[binIdx].imag -= dcRangeSigMean[ind].imag;
1905  ind++;
1906  }
1907  }
1908  }
1909  }
1910 }
1911 
1912 /*!*****************************************************************************************************************
1913  * \brief
1914  * Function Name : MmwDemo_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation
1915  *
1916  * \par
1917  * <b>Description</b> : Compensation of rx channel phase bias
1918  *
1919  * @param[in] obj Data path object
1920  *
1921  * @param[in] numObj Number of detected points
1922  *
1923  * @param[inout] azimuthSymbols Symbols of Azimuth antennas
1924  *
1925  * @param[inout] elevationSymbols Symbols of Elevation antennas
1926  *
1927  * @return void
1928  *
1929  *******************************************************************************************************************
1930  */
1931 void MmwDemo_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj,
1932  uint32_t numObj,
1933  cmplx16ImRe_t *azimuthSymbols,
1934  cmplx16ImRe_t *elevationSymbols)
1935 {
1936  cmplx16ImRe_t *rxChComp = (cmplx16ImRe_t *) obj->compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp;
1937  int32_t Re, Im;
1938  uint32_t i, j;
1939  uint32_t antIndx;
1940  uint32_t objIdx;
1941  uint32_t numAzimAnt = obj->numVirtualAntAzim;
1942  uint32_t numElevAnt = obj->numVirtualAntElev;
1943 
1944 
1945  for (objIdx = 0; objIdx < numObj; objIdx++)
1946  {
1947  j = 0;
1948  /* Compensation of azimuth antennas */
1949  for (antIndx = 0; antIndx < numAzimAnt; antIndx++)
1950  {
1951  i = objIdx*numAzimAnt + antIndx;
1952  Re = (int32_t) azimuthSymbols[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real -
1953  (int32_t) azimuthSymbols[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag;
1954 
1955  Im = (int32_t) azimuthSymbols[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag +
1956  (int32_t) azimuthSymbols[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real;
1957  Re = (Re + 0x4000) >> 15;
1958  Im = (Im + 0x4000) >> 15;
1959  Re = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_HIGH(Re);
1960  Re = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_LOW(Re);
1961  Im = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_HIGH(Im);
1962  Im = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_LOW(Im);
1963 
1964  azimuthSymbols[i].real = (int16_t) Re;
1965  azimuthSymbols[i].imag = (int16_t) Im;
1966  j++;
1967  }
1968  /* Compensation of elevation antennas */
1969  for (antIndx = 0; antIndx < numElevAnt; antIndx++)
1970  {
1971  if(elevationSymbols == NULL)
1972  {
1973  break;
1974  }
1975  else
1976  {
1977  i = objIdx*numElevAnt + antIndx;
1978  Re = (int32_t) elevationSymbols[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real -
1979  (int32_t) elevationSymbols[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag;
1980 
1981  Im = (int32_t) elevationSymbols[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag +
1982  (int32_t) elevationSymbols[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real;
1983  Re = (Re + 0x4000) >> 15;
1984  Im = (Im + 0x4000) >> 15;
1985  Re = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_HIGH(Re);
1986  Re = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_LOW(Re);
1987  Im = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_HIGH(Im);
1988  Im = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_LOW(Im);
1989  elevationSymbols[i].real = (int16_t) Re;
1990  elevationSymbols[i].imag = (int16_t) Im;
1991  j++;
1992  }
1993  }
1994  }
1995 }
1996 
1997 
2003 void MmwDemo_process2D(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
2004 {
2005  MmwDemo_config2D_HWA(obj);
2006  MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger2D(obj);
2007  MmwDemo_dataPathWait2D(obj);
2008 }

2015 void MmwDemo_processCfar(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj, uint16_t *numDetectedObjects)
2016 {
2017  MmwDemo_configCFAR_HWA(obj);
2018  MmwDemo_dataPathTriggerCFAR(obj);
2019  MmwDemo_dataPathWaitCFAR(obj);
2020 
2021  HWA_readCFARPeakCountReg(obj->hwaHandle,
2022  (uint8_t *) numDetectedObjects, sizeof(uint16_t));
2023  obj->numHwaCfarDetections = *numDetectedObjects;
2024 }
2025 
2031 void MmwDemo_processAngle(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
2032 {
2033  uint32_t numObjOut;
2034  uint32_t idx;
2035  float range;
2036  uint32_t oneQFormat;
2037 
2038  /* Pre-processing before Angle estimation
2039  1. Peak Grouping if enabled
2040  2. Do Singlebin 2D FFT if DATA_PATH_CHAIN_COMBINED_LOGMAG is selected
2041  3. Doppler compensation if there is detected objects
2042  4. Doppler index conversion if there is detected objects
2043  */
2044  if(obj->datapathChainSel == DATA_PATH_CHAIN_SEPARATE_LOGMAG)
2045  {
2046  /* Save Azimuth heap in L3 RAM */
2047  uint32_t skip = obj->numChirpsPerFrame * obj->numRxAntennas;
2048  uint32_t copySize = obj->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t);
2049 
2050  for (idx = 0; idx < obj->numRangeBins; idx++)
2051  {
2052  memcpy( (void *)&obj->azimuthStaticHeatMap[idx * obj->numVirtualAntAzim],
2053  (void *)&obj->radarCube[idx * skip],
2054  copySize);
2055 
2056  }
2057 
2058  /* Peak grouping */
2059  numObjOut = MmwDemo_peakGrouping(obj->numHwaCfarDetections,
2060  obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix,
2061  (cfarDetOutput_t* ) MMW_HWA_CFAR_OUT,
2062  obj->radarCube,
2063  &obj->objOut[0],
2064  (uint32_t*) MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_INP,
2065  (uint32_t*) MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_INP,
2066  obj->numVirtualAntAzim,
2067  obj->numVirtualAntElev,
2068  obj->numDopplerBins,
2069  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.minRangeIndex,
2070  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.maxRangeIndex,
2071  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.inDopplerDirectionEn,
2072  0);//peak grouping in range direction done in HWA
2073  }
2074  else if (obj->cliCfg->guiMonSel.rangeAzimuthHeatMap)
2075  {
2076  /* Extra steps: Single Bin 2DFFT on detected Objects */
2077  uint32_t RangeBinSize;
2078  RangeBinSize = obj->numDopplerBins * obj->numVirtualAntennas;
2079  uint32_t copySize = obj->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t);
2080 
2081  /* Peak grouping */
2082  numObjOut = MmwDemo_peakGrouping(obj->numHwaCfarDetections,
2083  obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix,
2084  (cfarDetOutput_t* ) MMW_HWA_CFAR_OUT,
2085  obj->radarCube,
2086  &obj->objOut[0],
2087  (uint32_t*) MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_INP,
2088  (uint32_t*) MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_INP,
2089  obj->numVirtualAntAzim,
2090  obj->numVirtualAntElev,
2091  obj->numDopplerBins,
2092  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.minRangeIndex,
2093  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.maxRangeIndex,
2094  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.inDopplerDirectionEn,
2095  0);//peak grouping in range direction done in HWA
2096 
2097  for(idx = 0; idx < obj->numRangeBins; idx++)
2098  {
2099  /* Config HWA for single bin 2D FFT */
2100  MmwDemo_configDetectedObj2DFFT_HWA( obj,
2101  (uint32_t *)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_INP,
2102  (uint32_t *)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_OUT
2103  );
2104 
2105  /* Config EDMA to copy 1D FFT symbol to HWA memory */
2106  MmwDemo_config2DSingleBin_EDMA(obj,
2107  (uint32_t)(&obj->radarCube[RangeBinSize * idx]),
2108  (uint32_t)(MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_INP)
2109  );
2110  /* Trigger single 2D FFT */
2111  MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger2DSingleBin(obj);
2112 
2113  /* Wait until HWA done with FFT */
2114  MmwDemo_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(obj);
2115 
2116  memcpy( (void *)&obj->azimuthStaticHeatMap[idx * obj->numVirtualAntAzim],
2117  (void *)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_OUT,
2118  copySize);
2119 
2120  memcpy( (void *)&obj->radarCube[RangeBinSize * idx],
2121  (void *)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_OUT,
2122  RangeBinSize);
2123  }
2124 
2125 
2126  }
2127  else
2128  {
2129  numObjOut = MmwDemo_peakGrouping(obj->numHwaCfarDetections,
2130  obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix,
2131  (cfarDetOutput_t* ) MMW_HWA_CFAR_OUT,
2132  (uint32_t*)NULL,
2133  &obj->objOut[0],
2134  (uint32_t*)NULL,
2135  (uint32_t*)NULL,
2136  obj->numVirtualAntAzim,
2137  obj->numVirtualAntElev,
2138  obj->numDopplerBins,
2139  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.minRangeIndex,
2140  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.maxRangeIndex,
2141  obj->cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg.inDopplerDirectionEn,
2142  0);//peak grouping in range direction done in HWA
2143 
2144  if (( numObjOut > 0) && (obj->numVirtualAntAzim != 1))
2145  {
2146  /* Extra steps: Single Bin 2DFFT on detected Objects */
2147  uint32_t dstAddrAzim;
2148  uint32_t srcAddrElev;
2149  uint32_t dstAddrElev;
2150 
2151  uint32_t RangeBinSize;
2152  uint32_t dopplerBinSize;
2153  uint32_t previousIdx = obj->numRangeBins;
2154  RangeBinSize = obj->numDopplerBins * obj->numVirtualAntennas;
2155  dopplerBinSize = sizeof(uint32_t) * obj->numVirtualAntennas;
2156 
2157  /* Azimuth & Elevation buffer */
2158  dstAddrAzim = (uint32_t)MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_INP;
2159  dstAddrElev = (uint32_t)MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_INP;
2160 
2161  srcAddrElev = (uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_OUT + sizeof(uint32_t) * obj->numVirtualAntAzim;
2162  for(idx = 0;idx < numObjOut; idx++)
2163  {
2164 
2165  if (previousIdx != obj->objOut[idx].rangeIdx)
2166  {
2167  /* Config HWA for single bin 2D FFT */
2168  MmwDemo_configDetectedObj2DFFT_HWA( obj,
2169  (uint32_t *)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_INP,
2170  (uint32_t *)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_OUT
2171  );
2172 
2173  /* Config EDMA to copy 1D FFT symbol to HWA memory */
2174  MmwDemo_config2DSingleBin_EDMA(obj,
2175  (uint32_t)(&obj->radarCube[RangeBinSize * obj->objOut[idx].rangeIdx]),
2176  (uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_INP
2177  );
2178  /* Trigger single 2D FFT */
2179  MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger2DSingleBin(obj);
2180 
2181  /* Wait until HWA done with FFT */
2182  MmwDemo_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(obj);
2183  }
2184 
2185  /* Save the output from one RangeBin 2D FFT result */
2186  memcpy((void *)dstAddrAzim,
2187  (void *)((uint32_t)MMW_HWA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_OUT + obj->objOut[idx].dopplerIdx * dopplerBinSize),
2188 
2189  sizeof(uint32_t) * obj->numVirtualAntAzim);
2190  dstAddrAzim += obj->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t);
2191 
2192  if(obj->numVirtualAntElev > 0)
2193  {
2194  memcpy((void *)dstAddrElev,
2195  (void *)(srcAddrElev + obj->objOut[idx].dopplerIdx * dopplerBinSize) ,
2196 
2197  sizeof(uint32_t) * obj->numVirtualAntElev);
2198 
2199  dstAddrElev += obj->numVirtualAntElev * sizeof(uint32_t);
2200  }
2201 
2202  previousIdx = obj->objOut[idx].rangeIdx;
2203 
2204  }
2205  }
2206  }
2207 
2208  /* Azimuth heap hep doppler compensation */
2209  if (obj->cliCfg->guiMonSel.rangeAzimuthHeatMap)
2210  {
2211  /* Rx channel gain/phase offset compensation */
2212  MmwDemo_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(obj,
2213  obj->numRangeBins,
2214  obj->azimuthStaticHeatMap,
2215  (cmplx16ImRe_t *)NULL);
2216 
2217  /* Doppler compensation for Azimuth heat map */
2218  MmwDemo_azimHeapMapDopplerCompensation(
2219  obj->azimuthStaticHeatMap,
2220  0, /* dopplerIdx = 0 */
2221  obj->numTxAntennas,
2222  obj->numRxAntennas,
2223  obj->numVirtualAntAzim,
2224  obj->numVirtualAntElev,
2225  obj->numDopplerBins,
2226  obj->numRangeBins);
2227  }
2228 
2229  obj->numObjOut = numObjOut;
2230 
2231  /* Angle estimation */
2232  if(obj->numVirtualAntAzim == 1)
2233  {
2234  oneQFormat = 1 << obj->xyzOutputQFormat;
2235  /*If there is only one virtual antenna, there is no
2236  need of azimuth FFT as azimuth can not be estimated.*/
2237  for(idx=0; idx < numObjOut; idx++)
2238  {
2239  range = obj->objOut[idx].rangeIdx * obj->rangeResolution;
2240  if(range < 0)
2241  {
2242  obj->objOut[idx].y = (int16_t) (range * oneQFormat - 0.5);
2243  }
2244  else
2245  {
2246  obj->objOut[idx].y = (int16_t) (range * oneQFormat + 0.5);
2247  }
2248  obj->objOut[idx].x = 0;
2249  obj->objOut[idx].z = 0;
2250  obj->objOut[idx].peakVal = obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix[obj->objOut[idx].rangeIdx*obj->numDopplerBins +
2251  obj->objOut[idx].dopplerIdx];
2252 
2253  obj->objOut[idx].dopplerIdx = DOPPLER_IDX_TO_SIGNED(obj->objOut[idx].dopplerIdx , obj->numDopplerBins);
2254  }
2255  }
2256  else if (numObjOut > 0)
2257  {
2258 
2259  /* Rx channel gain/phase offset compensation */
2260  MmwDemo_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(obj,
2261  numObjOut,
2262  (cmplx16ImRe_t *) MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_INP,
2263  (cmplx16ImRe_t *) MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_INP);
2264 
2265  /* Doppler Compensation */
2266  if (obj->numVirtualAntAzim > obj->numRxAntennas)
2267  {
2268  /* For detected objects : doppler compensation is done before Angle estimation */
2269  MmwDemo_dopplerCompensation(numObjOut,
2270  (uint32_t*) MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_INP,
2271  (uint32_t*) MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_INP,
2272  obj->objOut,
2273  (uint32_t *)MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_INP,
2274  (uint32_t *)MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_INP,
2275  obj->numTxAntennas,
2276  obj->numRxAntennas,
2277  obj->numVirtualAntAzim,
2278  obj->numVirtualAntElev,
2279  obj->numDopplerBins);
2280  }
2281 
2282 
2283  /* Convert doppler index to signed index */
2284  for(idx=0; idx < numObjOut; idx++)
2285  {
2286  obj->objOut[idx].dopplerIdx = DOPPLER_IDX_TO_SIGNED(obj->objOut[idx].dopplerIdx , obj->numDopplerBins);
2287  }
2288 
2289  /* Angle estimation - Azimuth FFT */
2290  MmwDemo_configAngleEstimation_HWA(obj, numObjOut);
2291  /* Ensure R4F writes to HWA memory is flushed out */
2292  MEM_BARRIER();
2293  MmwDemo_dataPathTriggerAngleEstimation(obj);
2294  MmwDemo_dataPathWaitAngleEstimation(obj);
2295  /* Azimuth FFT done!*/
2296 
2297  angleEstimationAzimElev((uint16_t *)MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_ABS_OUT,
2298  (uint16_t *)MMW_HWA_ANGLE_AZIM_CPLX_OUT,
2299  (uint16_t *)MMW_HWA_ANGLE_ELEV_CPLX_OUT,
2300  obj);
2301  }
2302 }

2309 uint32_t MmwDemo_pow2roundup (uint32_t x)
2310 {
2311  uint32_t result = 1;
2312  while(x > result)
2313  {
2314  result <<= 1;
2315  }
2316  return result;
2317 }
